title: Smoked mackerel and horseradish fishcakes served with beetroot salad
description: If you fancy a more punchy, peppery flavour to the fishcakes, then use the peppered smoked mackerel fillets. They add a real punch to the recipe.
ingredients: 500g/1 lb 2oz medium-sized potatoes, peeled and halved
2 tbsp plain flour, seasoned with salt and freshly ground black pepper
sunflower or vegetable oil, for shallow frying
salt and freshly ground black pepper
